boat.construction_details: Lapstrake ply on internal stringers across bulkheads. Bilge keel. Double forward berth and two quarter berths. Internal 4kw electric motor with traditional shaft through keels keg. 48 volt, 200 ah lead batteries acting as internal ballast.
boat.full_description:
Squiggles is a "Cape Henry", built at home over 3 years, with the original Dudley Dix design modified with Dudley''s approval. She has a direct drive electric motor, with 240 kg of lead batteires replacing a similar quantity of internal ballast.

Rig consists of a yankee and staysail rather than a genoa.
boat.name: Squiggles
boat.short_description: Squiggles is a modified Cape Henry design.
